original_text: Came behind him, and touched the border of his garment: and immediately her issue of blood stanched.
korean_text: 예수의 뒤로 와서 그의 옷 가에 손을 대니 혈루증이 즉시 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: and touched the border of his garment
and immediately her issue of blood stanched
sentences.korean_translation: 그 즉시 그의 혈루증이 그치게 되니라
